Package seng202.team4.model

Class DataLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.team4.model.DataLoader
  • public abstract class DataLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles loading data into the database. The data can be loaded from either: the default data, the user uploading a file or the user adding a new record

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DataLoader()

      static boolean addNewRecord​(DataType dataType, java.lang.String setName)
      Adds a new record to the database.
      static void addToAirportsSelectedDatabase​(Airport airport)
      Adds a route to the AirportsSelected database table when the user clicks on its corresponding checkbox
      static boolean addToRoutesSelectedDatabase​(Route route)
      Adds a route to the RoutesSelected database table when the user clicks on its corresponding checkbox The distance is also calculated via the Calculations class before the route is inserted.
      static boolean deleteRecord​(int id, java.lang.String table)
      Deletes a selected row from its corresponding database table and the table view when the corresponding 'Delete' button is clicked
      private static int getSetID​(java.lang.String setName, DataType dataType, java.sql.Statement stmt)
      Gets the ID of a set given the sets name and what data type it is.

      Removes an airport from the AirportsSelected database table when its corresponding checkbox is unselected

      Updates a given record in the database

      Uploads data to the database from a file of a specific dataType with a name for the new set of data.

      • uploadData

        public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> uploadData​(java.lang.String setName,
                                                               java.io.File file,
                                                               DataType dataType)
        Uploads data to the database from a file of a specific dataType with a name for the new set of data.
        Parameters:
        setName - String the name of the new set of data.
        file - File the file that's being uploaded to the database.
        dataType - DataType the data type of new data that's being uploaded.
        Returns:
        ArrayList an ArrayList of erroneous lines

      • addNewRecord

        public static boolean addNewRecord​(DataType dataType,
                                   java.lang.String setName)
        Adds a new record to the database.
        Parameters:
        dataType - DataType the type of data the new record is.
        setName - String the name of the set the data will be added to.
        Returns:
        'true' if record was successfully inserted into the database, 'false' otherwise

      • updateRecord

        public static boolean updateRecord​(DataType dataType,
                                   java.lang.String setName)
        Updates a given record in the database
        Parameters:
        dataType - datatype to update, one of Airline, Airport, Route, FlightPath
        setName - set in which the record sits
        Returns:
        true of record is updated successfully, false otherwise

      • getSetID

        private static int getSetID​(java.lang.String setName,
                            DataType dataType,
                            java.sql.Statement stmt)
                     throws java.sql.SQLException
        Gets the ID of a set given the sets name and what data type it is.
        Parameters:
        setName - String the name of the set.
        dataType - DataType the data type of the set.
        stmt - Statement the statement used to to execute the query.
        Returns:
        int the ID of the set.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - SQL Exception

      • addToRoutesSelectedDatabase

        public static boolean addToRoutesSelectedDatabase​(Route route)
        Adds a route to the RoutesSelected database table when the user clicks on its corresponding checkbox The distance is also calculated via the Calculations class before the route is inserted.
        Parameters:
        route - Route the route that has been selected with a checkbox

      • removeFromRoutesSelectedDatabase

        public static boolean removeFromRoutesSelectedDatabase​(Route route)
        Removes a route from the RoutesSelected database table when its corresponding checkbox is unselected
        Parameters:
        route - Route the route to be removed
        Returns:
        True if it passed

      • addToAirportsSelectedDatabase

        public static void addToAirportsSelectedDatabase​(Airport airport)
        Adds a route to the AirportsSelected database table when the user clicks on its corresponding checkbox
        Parameters:
        airport - Airport the airport that has been selected with a checkbox

      • removeFromAirportsSelectedDatabase

        public static boolean removeFromAirportsSelectedDatabase​(Airport airport)
        Removes an airport from the AirportsSelected database table when its corresponding checkbox is unselected
        Parameters:
        airport - Airport the airport to be removed
        Returns:
        True if it passed

      • deleteRecord

        public static boolean deleteRecord​(int id,
                                   java.lang.String table)
        Deletes a selected row from its corresponding database table and the table view when the corresponding 'Delete' button is clicked
        Parameters:
        id - int id of the object and record to be removed from the database table
        table - String the name of the database table where the record will be removed from
        Returns:
        boolean true if delete successful, false otherwise
